post.body: that's how i quit... going on 19 months now

u can sign up for the newsletter to be alerted of events.(dmtweetup.org) We would LOVE you to have you come to next #dmtweetup

haha don't you just love SEO companies who have little/no presence on google? hmm that should be a blog post...
